## Development Background

This project is inspired by [Bongo-Cat-Mver](https://github.com/MMmmmoko/Bongo-Cat-Mver) developed by [MMmmmoko](https://github.com/MMmmmoko). It is loved by users for its unique interactive cat feature, but it only supports the Windows platform. As a heavy macOS user, I really wanted to use this cute cat on my device, so I decided to develop a version adapted for macOS.

Also, thanks to the powerful cross-platform capabilities of [Tauri](https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri), this project supports not only macOS but also Windows and Linux(x11), allowing more users to interact with this cute cat!

## Download

- [Quark Cloud Drive](https://pan.quark.cn/s/70f2f2663ce1)
- [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/ayangweb/BongoCat/releases)

Not sure which one to download? Please check the [Download Guide](DOWNLOAD_GUIDE_en.md).

## Features

- Supports macOS, Windows, and Linux(x11).
- Synchronizes actions based on keyboard, mouse, or controller input.
- Supports importing custom models to freely create your exclusive cat image.
- Completely open source, transparent code, never collects any user data.
- Supports offline operation, no internet connection required, protecting user privacy.

## Model Conversion

If you want to convert models from the Bongo-Cat-Mver application to a format compatible with BongoCat, you can use the following tool:

üîó [Online Converter](https://bongocat.vteamer.cc)
